articles.title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Overheating Reports: Insider Addresses Issue - Forbes
articles.description: Recent coverage of the just-released iPhone 15 series of handsets has been intense, with plenty of reviews praising the cameras, the new design and much more.
articles.content:
Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max in Natural Titanium finish. Some iPhones are overheating - how many and why?
David Phelan
